LanguageData.BodyMastery.degreeDatas.body_mastery.des: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. {PAWN_possessive} body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned {PAWN_possessive} eyes completely white.
LanguageData.Disturbing.degreeDatas.disturbing.label: disturbing
LanguageData.Disturbing.degreeDatas.disturbing.descri: {PAWN_nameDef} is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to {PAWN_objective} is often upsetting.
LanguageData.Joyous.degreeDatas.joyous.label: joyous
LanguageData.Joyous.degreeDatas.joyous.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.
LanguageData.Occultist.degreeDatas.occultist.label: occultist
LanguageData.Occultist.degreeDatas.occultist.descript: {PAWN_nameDef} has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy. {PAWN_pronoun} can study unnatural entities faster than others. {PAWN_pronoun} will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when {PAWN_pronoun} gets the chance.
LanguageData.PerfectMemory.degreeDatas.perfect_memory: {PAWN_nameDef} has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. {PAWN_possessive} skills will never decay.
LanguageData.VoidFascination.degreeDatas.void_fascina: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.
